column1: Invalid argument:  Commit messages: you need to provide an expression to match against.

column2: a program used to collect statistics from a VCS.
--log LOG                                         Log file with input data
--version-control VCS                             Input vcs module type: supports svn
--analysis ANALYSIS                      authors  The analysis to run (abs-churn

column1: --input-encoding INPUT-ENCODING                   Specify an encoding other than UTF-8 for the log file

column2: --outfile OUTFILE                                 Write the result to the given file name
--group GROUP                                     A file with a pre-defined set of layers. The data will be aggregated according to the group of layers.
--team-map-file TEAM-MAP-FILE                     A CSV file with author
column3: team that translates individuals into teams.

column2: --min-revs MIN-REVS                      5        Minimum number of revisions to include an entity in the analysis
--min-shared-revs MIN-SHARED-REVS        5        Minimum number of shared revisions to include an entity in the analysis
--min-coupling MIN-COUPLING              30       Minimum degree of coupling (in percentage) to consider
--max-coupling MAX-COUPLING              100      Maximum degree of coupling (in percentage) to consider
--max-changeset-size MAX-CHANGESET-SIZE  30       Maximum number of modules in a change set if it shall be included in a coupling analysis
--expression-to-match MATCH-EXPRESSION            A regex to match against commit messages. Used with -messages analyses
--temporal-period TEMPORAL-PERIOD                 Used for coupling analyses. Instructs Code Maat to consider all commits during the rolling temporal period as a single
--age-time-now AGE-TIME_NOW                       Specify a date as YYYY-MM-dd that counts as time zero when doing a code age analysis
